author: Slidebean
description:
Why Bitcoin miners are pivoting into AI infrastructure.

Post halving economics have pushed Bitcoin miners to rethink their business models.
With access to scarce power contracts and grid connections, many are repurposing facilities to host AI workloads instead of mining crypto.

While AI hosting offers stable, contract based revenue, it requires heavy investment in cooling and networking infrastructure and introduces new risk if market conditions shift.

The result is a new hybrid model where operators arbitrage between compute markets based on energy profitability.

👉 Visit our YouTube channel for more content.
title: Bitcoin miners found a better customer than Bitcoin
